##HW Problem 1 (d)

##HW Problem 1 (e/f)
```{R,echo=TRUE}
titi_calls <- rpois(n=104,lambda = 15)
head(titi_calls)
hist(titi_calls,xlim=c(0,30),probability = T,xlab="# of calls",ylab ="Frequency",main = "Histogram of Titi calls (simulated dataset:n=104)")
```
